comment: Rian Satterwhite is an awesome and passionate professor. This class is a small group discussion platform that does require heavy reading, but allows for alternate viewpoints and an in-depth analysis of the material that is hardly reached in other classes. Rian is amazing and, while intense, the class can be easy! Worth taking!

All-in-all this is a great course with a very knowledgable, intelligent, and passionate professor. He is fair. Books are required and you will do HEAVEY reading. This instructor has a habit of asking simple/general questions and expects you to expand greatly. Be careful about assignment: content, depth, accuracy, citations, spelling, & grammar!!
